chat_history.message:
Hello,

My iPhone 12 mini is experiencing the following issue:

The phone won't hold a charge even when the battery is fully charged, and I have to recharge it three times a day. This isn't sustainable for me.

Thank you for your help,

Hi ecomobile, 

The tracking indicates that the package was delivered to you on 04/06/2024.
As a reminder, you have 48 working hours to refund the order.
Please respect the deadline.

Pacome, Back Market Customer Care

Dear Backcare,

We are currently still processing the phone, we will take note of this deadline. Thank you.

Regards,
CH

Hi ecomobile,

Well noted.

Pacome, Back Market Customer Care

Dear Backcare,

The refund request has been processed.

Regards,
TB
